name: "Supergirl" Season 2 Episode 8 Multiple Choice Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Supergirl's Kryptonian father.

	The virus was designed to fight off intruders on Krypton. Cadmus wanted to use it to rid the Earth of all aliens.

questions.text: Which holiday was being celebrated at the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Thanksgiving.

	It was was becoming a theme for the series, this is the second year in a row they did a Thanksgiving episode and had Eliza Danvers in as a guest appearance. Danvers was played by Helen Slater, who played "Supergirl" in the 1984 live-action movie.

questions.text: Who did Kara interview for a piece on women in power and their mothers?
questions.explanation:
Lena Luthor.

	She was trying to find out what Lena knew about Lillian Luthor's plans to use Supergirl's blood. She didn't get any real answers during the interview.

questions.text: Who killed the aliens at the bar?
questions.explanation:
Cyborg Superman.

	He placed a device under the bar and walked out. Mon-El followed him out and they fought in the alley. While they were fighting the device released a toxic gas inside the bar.

True.

	She revealed it while speaking to her mother. Lillian Luthor revealed that she loved Lex more and said that no parent truly loves their parents equally. The two had barely spoken since Lex Luthor was put in jail, and even that happened off camera in the series. Lex hadn't ever appeared, only been referenced, in the series up to this point.

questions.text: What was the name of the robotic guard at the Fortress of Solitude?
questions.explanation:
Kelex.

	Kara was forced to destroy it when the robot thought she was an intruder. Cyborg Superman had reprogrammed the robot when he used her blood to break into the Fortress.

questions.text: Where did Supergirl and Cyborg Superman end up fighting each other?
options: On top of the Daily Planet building
questions.explanation:
In the lobby of L-Corp.

	They fought in the lobby of L-Corp. because that's where the substance needed to synthesize the poison was stored. Maggie ended up getting hurt during the fight.

questions.text: Where was Cadmus trying to release the virus?
questions.explanation:
The seaport.

	The virus, which would kill any aliens that weren't Kryptonian, was set to be released at the seaport. The show never explained why humans weren't killed by the virus that was designed to save only Kryptonians.

questions.text: J'onn shape changed into a Kryptonian to defeat Cyborg Superman.
questions.explanation:
False.

	His mutated into a hybrid green-white martian and managed to get the upper hand on the Cyborg. He had known all along it was happening, but it happened at just the right time to allow him to win the fight.

questions.text: Barry Allen and Cisco Ramon made appearances at the end of the episode. What superhero show were they primarily from?
questions.explanation:
The Flash.

	This was the second appearance for Barry Allen/The Flash on "Supergirl". The Flash and Cisco came to get Supergirl to help them with a fight in their own dimension. This appearance was the set up to a 4-show crossover event. Titled "Invasion!" it began with the brief appearance on "Supergirl" season 2 episode 8 and continued on "The Flash" season 3 episode 8, then "Arrow" season 5 episode 8 and finished on "Legends of Tomorrow" season 2 episode 7.
